metadata.title: CVE-2021-4129 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-4129` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:91.5.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
